channel.title: Need Dialogue help
channel.description:
My errors:
src\server\model\players\Client.java:781: cannot find symbol symbol : variable dialogueHandler location: class server.model.players.Client return dialogueHandler; ^ src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:88: sendDialogues(server.model.playe rs.Client,int,int) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (int,int) c.getDH().sendDialogues(2, npcType); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Declare dialoguehandler obv or if its not there then just import or somefink so it can read the symbol correctly…

And not sure if you can do this on return statements, but if its a method or something in a different class,

try like
Dialogue.dialogueHandler

Dialogue being the class
